author: BRICKBOY74
title: A nice decoration
review:
Well I got this because I went to the LEGO store the day after they had given it out. They had extras and gave one to me. I also noticed that Brickset forgot to include the printed brick in the front that said LEGO Land Florida.

Building experiance

It was a somewhat hard build for a MMB. I would highly recomend building it (http://www.1000steine.de/brickset/miscellaneous/mmmbInstructions/2011-08.pdf)  it even if you have no intention of keeping it built.

Parts

I think it is very goods parts for a MMB.

Playability

It has no features, and is a model of an inanimate object so there is no play. The parts can't build anything amazing either but they are good to have.

Value for money
It was Free!
